name: PlunderPiece
description:
Plunderpeice is a game all about plundering coins with given chess pieces. The pieces can move around exactly how you would expect from chess, and they collect all the coins in their path. Can you collect all the coins in the fewest moves possible?

In the beginning, place the pieces wherever you would like. Each piece must be placed on the board before you can make moves.

Create arrows to plan your strategy.

Earn medals based on your performance. Up to 6 moves over target gives bronze, 3 moves over target gives silver, and hitting or beating the target gives gold.

Comes with a total of 50 levels, with 10 4x4 levels, 10 6x6 levels, 10 8x8 levels, 10 10x10 levels, and 10 12x12 levels.

Achievements coming soon


Music in the trailer: Immortality - by Nojisuma. Licensed from Pixibay
